item.title: FCSC 2022 - Intro
item.description: I participated for the first time to the CTF France Cybersecurity Challenge (FCSC) organized by ANSSI. The first week, I was taking the CRTP exam and the second week I was working so I could focus on the challenges only in the evening after work. I finished 530th out of 1524 in the general ranking. Thanks to the organizers.
